trans-unit.source: Integer.parseInt(" 1"); // Exception (blank space)
trans-unit.target: Integer.parseInt(" 1"); //异常（空白）

trans-unit.source: Integer.parseInt(""); // Exception (not 0 or something)
trans-unit.target: Integer.parseInt(""); //异常（非0或其他值）

trans-unit.source: Integer.parseInt("+1"); // ok
trans-unit.target: Integer.parseInt("+1"); // 好

trans-unit.source: Integer.parseInt("-1"); // ok
trans-unit.target: Integer.parseInt("-1"); // 好

trans-unit.source: Integer.parseInt("1"); // ok
trans-unit.target: Integer.parseInt("1"); // 好

trans-unit.source: Integer.parseInt("1.1"); // Exception (. or , or whatever is not allowed)
trans-unit.target: Integer.parseInt("1.1"); //异常（ 。或，或不允许的任何东西）

trans-unit.source: Integer.parseInt("2147483648"); // Exception (Integer is limited to a maximum value of 2,147,483,647)
trans-unit.target: Integer.parseInt("2147483648"); //异常（整数被限制为最大值 2,147,483,647）

trans-unit.source: In programming competitions, where you're assured that number will always be a valid integer, then you can write your own method to parse input. This will skip all validation related code (since you don't need any of that) and will be a bit more efficient.

trans-unit.source: Now, why double? Well, because of a really "weird" step. Currently we have two doubles, 1 and 2, but we need to turn it into 12, there isn't any mathematic operation that we can do.
trans-unit.target: 现在,为什么是双倍?嗯,因为有一个非常 "奇怪 "的步骤。目前我们有两个双倍,1和2,但我们要把它变成12,没有任何数学运算可以做。

trans-unit.source: The Apache utility is nice because if the string is an invalid number format then 0 is always returned. Hence saving you the try catch block.
trans-unit.target: Apache实用程序很好,因为如果字符串是一个无效的数字格式,那么总是返回0。这样就可以省去了try catch块。

trans-unit.source: The first thing to do is to receive the input, in this case, a string of digits; I'll call it String number, and in this case, I'll exemplify it using the number 12, therefore String number = "12";
trans-unit.target: 首先要做的是接收输入，在这种情况下，是一串数字。 我将其称为 String number ，在这种情况下，我将使用数字12进行示例，因此 String number = "12";

trans-unit.target: 使用字符串常数进行比较或任何类型的计算总是一个好主意,因为常数永远不会返回空值。

trans-unit.target: 我们还可以使用 toInt(String strValue) 实用程序类的 toInt（String strValue）进行转换：

trans-unit.source: We can use the parseInt(String str) method of the Integer wrapper class for converting a String value to an integer value.
trans-unit.target: 我们可以使用 Integer 包装器类的 parseInt(String str) 方法将String值转换为整数值。

trans-unit.source: We're dividing the latter (lastdigit) by 10 in the fashion 2/10 = 0.2 (hence why double) like this:
trans-unit.target: 我们以 2/10 = 0.2 （因此为什么加倍）的方式将后者（最后一位）除以10，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: Well, a very important point to consider is that the Integer parser throws NumberFormatException as stated in Javadoc.
trans-unit.target: 好吧，需要考虑的非常重要的一点是Integer解析器抛出Javadoc中所述的NumberFormatException。

trans-unit.source: What's up with -/+ before or after the string? Is that possible (referring to accounting numbers)?
trans-unit.target: 字符串前后的-/ +是怎么回事？ 有可能吗（指会计编号）？

trans-unit.source: What's up with MAX_-/MIN_INFINITY? What will happen if the string is 99999999999999999999? Can the machine treat this string as an int?
trans-unit.target: MAX _- / MIN_INFINITY怎么了？ 如果字符串是99999999999999999999，会发生什么？ 机器可以将此字符串视为int吗？

trans-unit.source: Whenever there is the slightest possibility that the given String does not contain an Integer, you have to handle this special case. Sadly, the standard Java methods Integer::parseInt and Integer::valueOf throw a NumberFormatException to signal this special case. Thus, you have to use exceptions for flow control, which is generally considered bad coding style.
trans-unit.target: 只要极有可能给定的String不包含Integer，就必须处理这种特殊情况。 可悲的是，标准Java方法 Integer::parseInt 和 Integer::valueOf 抛出 NumberFormatException 来表示这种特殊情况。 因此，您必须对流控制使用异常，这通常被认为是不良的编码风格。

trans-unit.source: While this is still using exceptions for flow control internally, the usage code becomes very clean. Also, you can clearly distinguish the case where -1 is parsed as a valid value and the case where an invalid String could not be parsed.
trans-unit.target: 尽管这仍在内部使用异常进行流控制，但是用法代码变得非常清晰。 此外，您可以清楚地区分将 -1 解析为有效值的情况和无法解析无效String的情况。

trans-unit.source: Without getting too into the math, we're simply isolating units the digits of a number. You see, since we only consider 0-9, dividing by a multiple of 10 is like creating a "box" where you store it (think back at when your first grade teacher explained you what a unit and a hundred were). So:
trans-unit.target: 不需要太深入的数学知识,我们只是把单位隔开,就是一个数字的位数。你看,因为我们只考虑0-9,所以除以10的倍数就像建立了一个 "盒子",把它储存起来(回想一下你一年级时老师给你解释过什么是单位和百的时候)。所以。

trans-unit.source: You can also begin by removing all non-numerical characters and then parsing the integer:
trans-unit.target: 你也可以从删除所有非数字字符开始,然后对整数进行解析。

trans-unit.source: You can also define your own default value:
trans-unit.target: 你也可以定义自己的默认值。

trans-unit.source: You can also use public static Integer decode(String nm) throws NumberFormatException.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以使用 public static Integer decode(String nm) throws NumberFormatException 。

trans-unit.source: You can use new Scanner("1244").nextInt(). Or ask if even an int exists: new Scanner("1244").hasNextInt()
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 new Scanner("1244").nextInt() 。 或询问是否存在int： new Scanner("1244").hasNextInt()
